Base: PREFIX schema:<http://schema.org/> SELECT * WHERE { ?sub a schema:Event . OPTIONAL {?sub schema:url ?url. } OPTIONAL {?sub schema:name ?name.} OPTIONAL {?sub schema:startDate ?startdate. } OPTIONAL {?sub schema:endDate ?enddate. } OPTIONAL {?sub schema:description ?description. } OPTIONAL {?sub schema:location ?location. } OPTIONAL {?sub schema:isAccessibleForFree ?isFree.} OPTIONAL {?sub schema:organizer ?organizer. } OPTIONAL { ?sub schema:image/schema:url ?image. }
NextEventsOnLocation: FILTER(str(?location) = "{0}" && ?startdate > "{1}" ^^ xsd:dateTime)}} ORDER BY ASC(?startdate) Limit {2}
